company.name: Shrestha Consolidated
company.description: We are a top-rated affordable website design company in Kathmandu, Nepal, specializing in static website design and business website setup for small businesses and startups.

hero.title: Build Your Dream Website
hero.subtitle: Affordable & Premium Web Solutions in Nepal
hero.description: We specialize in professional website design in Nepal, offering low-cost static website packages and business website setups in Kathmandu that drive measurable results.

pricing.name: One-Time Website Design
pricing.description: Perfect for businesses seeking a one-time website design service in Nepal with yearly renewal.

pricing.name: Monthly Subscription Plan
pricing.description: Ideal for small business websites in Nepal needing regular updates and reliable hosting.

pricing.name: Premium Plan
pricing.description: Best for growing businesses needing unlimited content updates and website design under 10,000 NPR value.

pricing.name: Rent a Website
pricing.description: Low budget website option: Rent a fully functional website with no upfront cost.

services.title: Static Website Design
services.description: Stunning, mobile-friendly website design in Nepal tailored to your brand identity and business goals.

services.title: Business Website Setup
services.description: Professional business website setup to showcase your services, portfolio, and products effectively to your customers.

services.title: Custom Development
services.description: Bespoke web interfaces built by local developers in Nepal using modern frontend technologies.

services.title: Website Management
services.description: Ongoing support, updates, and website management in Nepal to keep your site running smoothly.

portfolio.title: Ashish Restaurant
portfolio.description: A premium dining experience website with online reservations and menu showcase.

portfolio.title: Ashish GYM
portfolio.description: Modern fitness center website featuring membership plans and class schedules.

portfolio.title: Ashish Bakery Cafe
portfolio.description: Delightful bakery cafe website with product galleries and online ordering.

portfolio.title: Ashish Tattoo Studio
portfolio.description: Bold tattoo studio website showcasing artist portfolios and booking system.

portfolio.title: Ashish Hotel
portfolio.description: Luxurious hotel website with room previews and reservation management.

portfolio.title: CalcFusion
portfolio.description: A comprehensive suite of online calculators including FIRE & Retirement planner, EMI & Loan calculator with amortization schedules, and advanced BMI & Body Fat calculator.

about.story: Founded with a passion for digital innovation, Shrestha Consolidated has grown into a leading web development agency. We combine creative excellence with technical expertise to deliver websites that not only look stunning but also achieve business objectives.
about.mission: To empower businesses with premium digital solutions that drive growth and create lasting impact.

values.title: Quality First
values.description: We never compromise on quality, delivering excellence in every pixel and line of code.

values.title: Client-Centric
values.description: Your success is our success. We listen, understand, and deliver beyond expectations.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We stay ahead of trends, using cutting-edge technologies to build future-ready solutions.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear communication and honest partnerships are the foundation of our relationships.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Amazing Together
contact.description: Get in touch with us today to discuss your project and see how we can help bring your vision to life.
